name: $mode
desc: Returns: Defines which action to take if there is no match in the group. One of 3 actions is possible: use the unmapped code (this is useful when doing a mapping between versions, and only a few codes have changed), use a fixed code (a default code), or alternatively, a reference to a different concept map can be provided (by canonical URL).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Defines which action to take if there is no match in the group. One of 3 actions is possible: use the unmapped code (this is useful when doing a mapping between versions, and only a few codes have changed), use a fixed code (a default code), or alternativ

name: $code
desc: Returns: The fixed code to use when the mode = 'fixed'  - all unmapped codes are mapped to a single fixed code.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The fixed code to use when the mode = 'fixed'  - all unmapped codes are mapped to a single fixed code.

name: $display
desc: Returns: The display for the code. The display is only provided to help editors when editing the concept map.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The display for the code. The display is only provided to help editors when editing the concept map.

name: $url
desc: Returns: The canonical URL of the map to use if this map contains no mapping.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The canonical URL of the map to use if this map contains no mapping.
